mapper.select: SELECT f.familyEmail,f.familyName,f.familyBirth,f.familyAddr,f.familyTel,p.patientName,p.patientBirth,p.patientAddr,p.patientSex,p.patientTel,p.patientFamilyTel,p.patientBlood,p.patientDisease,p.patientGrade,p.patientMedication,p.patientUnique FROM family f, patient p WHERE f.familyNo = #{familyNo};
